About A&W Restaurant A&W Restaurant is a Fast Food restaurant located at 220 23rd St in Columbus, NE . A&W Restaurant has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Burgers, Take Out Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
